result.reason: Fixes a critical bug where the configuration file cannot be saved due to null values or empty content, preventing data persistence.
result.approach: Update XmlConnectionNodeSerializer28.cs to safely handle null string properties during serialization and modify XmlConnectionsSaver.cs to add checks preventing the saving of empty or invalid XML files.
